test.name: VEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - RAMP UP RUNNER : Run the Vegeta Load Tests that connect to Toxiproxy and ramp up.

kw.name: Automation Section For Slack Notifications
Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${AUTOMATION_SECTION_NAME} = VEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - RAMP UP
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.arg: VEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - RAMP UP

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Run Ramp Up Load Test Connected To Toxiproxy
Remove File
kw.doc: Removes a file with the given path.

kw.name: Run Vegeta Ramp Up Load Test
kw.msg:
Running Vegeta load test: go run vegeta-load-test-runner.go -rate 50 -duration 30s -url http://0.0.0.0:8080/user/vitae -method GET -output results-0.bin Vegeta load test executed successfully:
Vegeta Load Test Runner - Results
Requests: 1500 StatusCodes: map[200:1500] Errors [] Success Rate: 100 % Latencies (ms): - Mean: 10.009988722s - 50th percentile: 10.009024359s - 95th percentile: 10.012033445s - 99th percentile: 10.058393797s - Max: 10.120114944s
Running Vegeta load test: go run vegeta-load-test-runner.go -rate 100 -duration 60s -url http://0.0.0.0:8080/user/vitae -method GET -output results-1.bin Vegeta load test executed successfully:

Running Vegeta load test: go run vegeta-load-test-runner.go -rate 150 -duration 90s -url http://0.0.0.0:8080/user/vitae -method GET -output results-2.bin Vegeta load test executed successfully:

Requests: 24000 StatusCodes: map[200:24000] Errors [] Success Rate: 100 % Latencies (ms): - Mean: 10.007644614s - 50th percentile: 10.005085929s - 95th percentile: 10.014230275s - 99th percentile: 10.085725663s - Max: 10.178654589s

kw.name: Move Files
kw.doc: Moves specified files to the target directory.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Check the results.bin files found in... ${EXECDIR}/results
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

test.name: VEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - CUSTOMIZED PARAMETERS RUNNER : Run the Vegeta Load Tests with custom user defined parameters. This can run for seconds, minutes, hours, days etc. as long as the duration is given a valid amount of seconds.

kw.name: Automation Section For Slack Notifications
Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${AUTOMATION_SECTION_NAME} = VVEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - CUSTOMIZED PARAMETERS
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.arg: VVEGETA CHAOS LOAD TESTS - CUSTOMIZED PARAMETERS

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Run Custom Vegeta Load Test Connected To Toxiproxy
Remove File
kw.doc: Removes a file with the given path.

kw.name: Run Specific Parameters Vegeta Load Test
kw.msg:
Running Vegeta load test: go run vegeta-load-test-runner.go -rate 100 -duration 10s -url http://0.0.0.0:8080/store/order/9 -method GET -body -output results.bin Vegeta load test executed successfully:
Vegeta Load Test Runner - Results
Requests: 1000 StatusCodes: map[200:1000] Errors [] Success Rate: 100 % Latencies (ms): - Mean: 10.006886421s - 50th percentile: 10.006476681s - 95th percentile: 10.008393948s - 99th percentile: 10.019093287s - Max: 10.043903905s
kw.doc: Runs the vegeta-load-test-runner.go automation with specific given parameters for more customization.

kw.doc: Moves specified files to the target directory.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Check the results.bin files found in... ${EXECDIR}/results
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
